card.name: Gaial Ryusei Dragon, Star Dragon King
card.text: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "speed attacker". ■ Your opponent's psychic creatures can't attack or block. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put up to 2 cards from the top of your deck into your graveyard. card.name: Dondon Vacuuming Now
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the card revealed this way was a fire or nature card, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand.
